苟.definition: (literary) if indeed; (bound form) careless; negligent; (bound form) temporarily

苟且.definition: perfunctory; careless; drifting along; resigned to one's fate; improper (relations); illicit (sex)

苟且偷安.definition: seeking only ease and comfort (idiom); making no attempt to improve oneself; taking things easily without attending to responsibilities

苟且偷生.definition: to drift and live without purpose (idiom); to drag out an ignoble existence

苟取.definition: (literary) to extort; to take as bribe

苟安.definition: see 苟且偷安[gou3 qie3 tou1 an1]

苟富貴，勿相忘.pinyin: gou3 fu4 gui4 , wu4 xiang1 wang4
苟富貴，勿相忘.definition: don't forget your friends when you become rich

苟延殘喘.definition: (idiom) to struggle on whilst at death's door

苟活.definition: to live without dignity; to barely sustain oneself
